name: Peanut Butter Monster Cookie Dream Bars
author: yummyfood22
summary: My friend gave me this monster cookie bar recipe. These are heavenly. We always run out wherever we take them. I bet you can't eat just one!
ingredients: 1 cup candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Stir oatmeal, flour, butter, brown sugar, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl
Spread remaining mixture into a 9x13-inch baking pan
Bake in the preheated oven until crust is lightly browned, about 12 minutes
Mix sweetened condensed milk and peanut butter together in a bowl
Sprinkle the reserved crumb mixture and milk chocolate pieces on top
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 20 minutes
